front.title: Diameter Proxy Mobile IPv6: Support For Mobile Access Gateway and Local Mobility Anchor to Diameter Server Interaction

abstract.t: This specification defines the Diameter support for the Proxy MobileIPv6 and the corresponding mobility service session setup. Thepolicy information needed by the Proxy Mobile IPv6 is defined inmobile node's policy profile, which could be downloaded from theDiameter server to the Mobile Access Gateway once the mobile noderoams into a Proxy Mobile IPv6 Domain and performs accessauthentication.
